name: Alchemy: Effect
description: When you create a mix, roll the amount of twenty-sided dice indicated by that mix, then assign one of those rolls to the @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.rollable-tables.RollTable.vZa3GMOzrEVma2Hv]{target} table and one to the effect table (below). Discard all remaining dice, then describe the effects of the mix!

results.text: ... treats their Dexterity (@EFFECT[dex-up]) and Might (@EFFECT[mig-up]) dice as if they were one size higher (up to a maximum of d12) until the end of your next turn.
... treats their Insight (@EFFECT[ins-up]) and Willpower (@EFFECT[wlp-up]) dice as if they were one size higher (up to a maximum of d12) until the end of your next turn.
... suffers @DMG[20 air] damage. This amount increases to @DMG[30 air] damage if you are level 20 or higher, or to @DMG[40 air] damage if you are level 40 or higher.
... suffers @DMG[20 air] damage. This amount increases to @DMG[30 air] damage if you are level 20 or higher, or to @DMG[40 air] damage if you are level 40 or higher.
... suffers @DMG[20 dark] damage. This amount increases to @DMG[30 dark] damage if you are level 20 or higher, or to @DMG[40 dark] damage if you are level 40 or higher.
... suffers @DMG[20 earth] damage. This amount increases to @DMG[30 earth] damage if you are level 20 or higher, or to @DMG[40 earth] damage if you are level 40 or higher.
... suffers @DMG[20 fire] damage. This amount increases to @DMG[30 fire] damage if you are level 20 or higher, or to @DMG[40 fire] damage if you are level 40 or higher.
... suffers @DMG[20 ice] damage. This amount increases to @DMG[30 ice] damage if you are level 20 or higher, or to @DMG[40 ice] damage if you are level 40 or higher.

... gains Resistance to air (@EFFECT[eyJuYW1lIjoiUmVzaXN0YW5jZTogQWlyIiwiY2hhbmdlcyI6W3sia2V5Ijoic3lzdGVtLmFmZmluaXRpZXMuYWlyIiwibW9kZSI6MCwidmFsdWUiOiJ1cGdyYWRlIn1dLCJpY29uIjoiaWNvbnMvbWFnaWMvZGVmZW5zaXZlL3NoaWVsZC1iYXJyaWVyLWZsYW1pbmctcGVudGFnb24tdGVhbC1wdXJwbGUud2VicCJ9]) and fire (@EFFECT[eyJuYW1lIjoiUmVzaXN0YW5jZTogRmlyZSIsImNoYW5nZXMiOlt7ImtleSI6InN5c3RlbS5hZmZpbml0aWVzLmZpcmUiLCJtb2RlIjowLCJ2YWx1ZSI6InVwZ3JhZGUifV0sImljb24iOiJpY29ucy9tYWdpYy9kZWZlbnNpdmUvc2hpZWxkLWJhcnJpZXItZmxhbWluZy1wZW50YWdvbi1yZWQud2VicCJ9]) damage until the end of the scene.

... gains Resistance to bolt (@EFFECT[eyJuYW1lIjoiUmVzaXN0YW5jZTogQm9sdCIsImNoYW5nZXMiOlt7ImtleSI6InN5c3RlbS5hZmZpbml0aWVzLmJvbHQiLCJtb2RlIjowLCJ2YWx1ZSI6InVwZ3JhZGUifV0sImljb24iOiJpY29ucy9tYWdpYy9kZWZlbnNpdmUvc2hpZWxkLWJhcnJpZXItZmxhbWluZy1wZW50YWdvbi1ibHVlLXllbGxvdy53ZWJwIn0=]) and ice (@EFFECT[eyJuYW1lIjoiUmVzaXN0YW5jZTogSWNlIiwiY2hhbmdlcyI6W3sia2V5Ijoic3lzdGVtLmFmZmluaXRpZXMuaWNlIiwibW9kZSI6MCwidmFsdWUiOiJ1cGdyYWRlIn1dLCJpY29uIjoiaWNvbnMvbWFnaWMvZGVmZW5zaXZlL3NoaWVsZC1iYXJyaWVyLWZsYW1pbmctcGVudGFnb24tYmx1ZS53ZWJwIn0=])  damage until the end of the scene.

... gains Resistance to dark (@EFFECT[eyJuYW1lIjoiUmVzaXN0YW5jZTogRGFyayIsImNoYW5nZXMiOlt7ImtleSI6InN5c3RlbS5hZmZpbml0aWVzLmRhcmsiLCJtb2RlIjowLCJ2YWx1ZSI6InVwZ3JhZGUifV0sImljb24iOiJpY29ucy9tYWdpYy9kZWZlbnNpdmUvc2hpZWxkLWJhcnJpZXItZmxhbWluZy1wZW50YWdvbi1tYWdlbnRhLndlYnAifQ==]) and earth (@EFFECT[eyJuYW1lIjoiUmVzaXN0YW5jZTogRWFydGgiLCJjaGFuZ2VzIjpbeyJrZXkiOiJzeXN0ZW0uYWZmaW5pdGllcy5lYXJ0aCIsIm1vZGUiOjAsInZhbHVlIjoidXBncmFkZSJ9XSwiaWNvbiI6Imljb25zL21hZ2ljL2RlZmVuc2l2ZS9zaGllbGQtYmFycmllci1mbGFtaW5nLXBlbnRhZ29uLW9yYW5nZS53ZWJwIn0=])  damage until the end of the scene.
